section.name: Logging configuration
section.p: The octopus logging (not the module logging!) can be configured in the web.xml of the octopus webapplication or in your webapplication if you include the octopus as an library. In the default configuration the octopus use 10 rotation logging files with a maximum of 4 MB size.
You must define the logging parameters as init-params, like this:

tr.td: Defines the log level of the octopus, allowed are all java.util.logging levels.
Defines the filename pattern for logging, allowed are all FileHandler options.
Defines the maximum size of one log file, default is 4 MB. To disable limit set this parameter to 0 or disabled, also allowed is the option default.
Defines the maximum count of all log files, default is 10. To disable limit set this parameter to 1 or disabled, also allowed is the option default.
Optional histric parameter which define the log path. No default, it will insert between module path and logging.pattern.

section.p:
For more information about this parameters please read the java.util.logging API:
java.util.logging.Level (JavaDoc java.util.logging.FileHandler )JavaDoc)
